## Carregando bibliotecas



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidyverse)
library(gapminder)
```
:::



\newpage

## Filtrando dados e fazendo grafico de dispersão padrão



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
gap_07 <- filter(gapminder, year == 2007)
ggplot(gap_07, aes(x = gdpPercap, y = lifeExp)) +
  geom_point()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](imagens/Aula06/graf-dispersao-pad-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::



\newpage

## Transformando o eixo x para escala logarítimica


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(gap_07, aes(x = gdpPercap, y = lifeExp)) +
  geom_point() +
  scale_x_continuous(trans = "log10")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](imagens/Aula06/escala-log-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::



\newpage

## Outra forma de transformação do eixo x


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(gap_07, aes(x = gdpPercap, y = lifeExp)) +
  geom_point() +
  scale_x_log10()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](imagens/Aula06/outra-escala-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::



\newpage

## Definindo limites para o eixo y


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(gap_07, aes(x = gdpPercap, y = lifeExp)) +
  geom_point() +
  scale_x_log10() +
  scale_y_continuous(limits = c(0, 95))
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](imagens/Aula06/limites-eixoy-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::



\newpage

## Grafico com cores normais

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(gap_07, aes(x = gdpPercap, y = lifeExp, color = continent)) +
  geom_point() +
  scale_x_log10()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](imagens/Aula06/cores-normais-1.png){width=864}
:::
:::



\newpage

## Grafico usando uma paleta de cores diferente

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(gap_07, aes(x = gdpPercap, y = lifeExp, color = continent)) +
  geom_point() +
  scale_x_log10() +
  scale_color_brewer(palette = "Dark2")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](imagens/Aula06/cores-outras-1.png){width=864}
:::
:::



\newpage

## Usando codigos manuais para as cores


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(gap_07, aes(x = gdpPercap, y = lifeExp, color = continent)) +
  geom_point() +
  scale_x_log10() +
  scale_color_manual(values = c("#FF0000", "#00A08A", "#F2AD00",
                                "#F98400", "#5BBCD6"))
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](imagens/Aula06/codigos-cores-1.png){width=864}
:::
:::



\newpage

## Definindo as cores e tamanho dos pontos


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(gap_07, aes(x = gdpPercap, y = lifeExp)) +
  geom_point(color = "darkblue", size = 3) +
  scale_x_log10()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](imagens/Aula06/cores-tamanho-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::



\newpage

## Customizando títulos, rótulos de eixo e legendas


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(gap_07, aes(x = gdpPercap, y = lifeExp, color = continent)) +
  geom_point(size = 2) +
  scale_x_log10() +
  theme_light() +
  theme(legend.position = "bottom")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](imagens/Aula06/legenda_baixo-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::



\newpage

## Sem legenda


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(gap_07, aes(x = gdpPercap, y = lifeExp, color = continent)) +
  geom_point(size = 2) +
  scale_x_log10() +
  theme_light() +
  theme(legend.position = "none")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](imagens/Aula06/sem-legenda-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::



\newpage

## Legenda dentro do gráfico


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(gap_07, aes(x = gdpPercap, y = lifeExp, color = continent)) +
  geom_point(size = 2) +
  scale_x_log10() +
  theme_light() +
  theme(legend.position = c(0.1, 0.85))
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](imagens/Aula06/legenda-dentro-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::



\newpage

## Salvando o gráfico


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
graf1 <- ggplot(gap_07, aes(x = gdpPercap, y = lifeExp, color = continent)) +
  geom_point(size = 2) +
  scale_x_log10() +
  theme_light() +
  theme(legend.position = c(0.1, 0.85))

graf1
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](imagens/Aula06/salvando-grafico-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
ggsave("Exp_vida_pib_2007_1.png", plot=graf1, width = 7, height = 7)
```
:::



\newpage

## Aumentando o tamanho do texto e mudando para portugues


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
graf2 <- ggplot(gap_07, aes(x = gdpPercap, y = lifeExp, color = continent)) +
  geom_point(size = 2) +
  scale_x_log10() +
  theme_light() +
  theme(legend.position = c(0.1, 0.85),
        legend.key = element_blank(),
        axis.text = element_text(size = 12),
        axis.title = element_text(size = 14)) +
  labs(x = "PIB Per capita (US$)", 
       y = "Expectativa de Vida (anos)", 
       title = "Expectativa de Vida vs PIB em 2007",
       color = "Continente")

graf2
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](imagens/Aula06/mudando-texto-1.png){width=864}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
ggsave("Exp_vida_pib_2007_2.png", plot = graf2, width = 7, height = 7)
```
:::
